title: Completed PE Summary - Oriental Jasmin and De Vrouw
raw_html:
Vessel name De Vrouw Marie
Category Fishing
Registered Owner & Manager: De Vrouw Marie Ltd
Port of registry: Brixham
Flag: UK
Type: Fish catching/Processing
Built: 1972
Length overall: 30.4
Gross tonnage: 148.04
Date & Time 07/02/03
Location of incident: Foreign high seas
Incident Type: Collision
Injuries/ fatalities: None
Damage Material damage

Vessel name Oriental Jasmine
Category Tanker/Combination carrier
Port of registry: Panama
Flag: Panama
Type: Tanker/Combination carrier
Length overall: 124.
Gross tonnage: 5997.00
Injuries/ fatalities: None
Damage/ Pollution: Material damage

Synopsis

Collision between a chemical tanker and a beam trawler in the English Channel.

Action taken:

In view of the corrective action taken by the ship manager of Oriental Jasmine with regard to the vessel's bridge organisation, the Chief Inspector of Marine Accidents decided that additional recommendations were not required.
